pages.title: About
pages.text: Hi I’m Almas.I am a self-taught fullstack developer. Winner of local hackathon in 2015. I’m interested in machine learning and A.I. The last two months I spent on solving an ancient mathematical problem and eventually solved it. … Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/almas.askarbekov

posts.title: About me
posts.text: Hi I’m Almas.I am a fullstack developer. I’m interested in machine learning and A.I. The last two months I spent on solving an ancient mathematical problem and eventually solved it .By the way I’m not a mathematician. The irony is that I did not like math at school and university. I was even expelled from the university because of my problems with mathematics. But a couple of years later, after studying computer science and software development, I realized a lot of things that previously were unclear in math. Until April 16, I did not have any accounts in any social network, but after I found a solutions for a subj. problem, I decided to register in some of them. I have interesting stories to tell so far…Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/almas.askarbekov

posts.title: Diamond Section
posts.text: Doubling the cube. The solution.The paper in .pdf format available here. LATEX source can be downloaded here.
